description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to create and control various types of hormones, allowing them to manipulate the human body in numerous ways including healing, gender transformation, and enhancement.

abilities.name: Death Wink
abilities.description: A powerful wink that creates a shockwave

abilities.name: Healing Hormones
abilities.description: Hormones that stimulate the immune system to fight deadly poisons

abilities.name: Gender Transformation Hormones
abilities.description: Hormones that change a person's biological sex

strengths: Extremely versatile medical and combat applications
Allows for body modification and enhancement
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Healing techniques require sacrifice from the patient
Requires injection for most hormone-based abilities
significance: One of the most unique and versatile Devil Fruits, with abilities that challenge conventional biology and gender norms in the One Piece world
